People ask me, "Hey Calvin, I'm looking for a first person shooter game that takes me a long time to master, and even after the fact, I still get irritated every step of the way.  What do you recommend?"  To which I answer, boy do I have the game for you. 10/10

#csgo
The game is good, I play it for quite some time. For me, the only negative is cheaters.
I don’t seem like silver 1 or even master guardian, and I can show a good game, but when you make beautiful killings, they complain about you and as a result they often turn on cheats themselves.
Players, finally understand that you must be able to lose, cheats will not teach you absolutely anything, they will only lead you to blocking your account.
If you lose, then you are doing something wrong, then you need to change something in your game.
Review your matches and look for cons.

Learn, train and you will succeed.
Never use cheats.

I cannot recommend this game to anyone. If you like doing the same thing and using the same strategies as everyone else every turn then this is the game for you. I cannot believe I sunk so many hours into this mess of a game. Overall, it's repetitive, boring, has a toxic meta, annoying weapons and straight up boring gameplay that I could fall asleep to. Would not recommend. 3/10 at best
(I remark that while the game has potential, the utter lack of creativity by most players is astoundingly stupid, seeing as they can't seem to fathom that buying anything other than the AWP and the AK are good choices)
